name: UpdateEnterpriseGroupAttributes
description:
Update attributes for a provisioned enterprise group.

This tool updates individual attributes of a provisioned group in an enterprise account using the SCIM API. Users can perform add, remove, or replace operations on group attributes or memberships. Useful for updating group values or managing memberships efficiently.

parameters.name: scim_group_identifier
parameters.description: A unique identifier for the SCIM group to be updated. This is required to specify which group's attributes or memberships are being modified.

value_schema.description: A unique identifier of the SCIM group.

parameters.name: group_attributes_operations
parameters.description: JSON object specifying SCIM operations for group attributes. Must include 'Operations' with at least one operation ('add', 'replace', 'remove'), and optionally 'schemas'.

value.description: Corresponding 'value' of that field specified by 'path'

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the GitHub API.

parameters.name: scim_group_id
parameters.description: A unique identifier of the SCIM group.

value_schema.description: A unique identifier of the SCIM group.

value.description: Corresponding 'value' of that field specified by 'path'

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
